ProjectTitle: Beyond the Canon: A Digital Art Historical Approach to the International Circuit of Belgian Modern Art Exhibitions in the First Half of the Twentieth Century.
InitialFeedbackHistory:
30/06/2022
4. Documentation: will you use a reference manager such as Zotoro (www.zotero.org/) or annotation software like. NVivo (https://admin.kuleuven.be/icts/english/research/software/Nvivo/nvivo) or tropy (https://tropy.org/)? Many reference managers use the Dublin Core standard. If you like to learn more about these tools you can always request a meeting via rdm@kuleuven.be.
7. Sharing: KU Leuven now also has a data repository that you can use to share your data: www.kuleuven.be/rdm/en/rdr
label: good with suggestions
